It seems many people need help, i havent downloaded the game yet, but I usually never get any problems with installing downloaded games, so when I am finished I will write a step by step. So, just be patient

Ok after you have downloaded:

1. Extract the downloaded files, using Winrar.
2. Now you should have a folder called cd1 and cd 2 and crack. 
3. Mount the file in folder cd1 with deamon tools or alcohol 120%.
4. When asked for cd 2 mount file in folder cd 2.
5. Let it install, then go to folder "crack" copy these files to the folder you installed the game.
6. Stárt the game.))
If you have problems, update :
- DirectX
- FrameNET
- Drivers for grafikcard

This is no virus, so make sure firewall is not blocking the game. Also make sure you dont use any bad antivirus programs.

Having problems with CD2, won't work with PowerISO or Daemontools
No need for crack. Just download and install patch 1.05 (they removed the protection).

So for everyone who has an issue with the mounting of CD2 all you have to do is not mount the .img file but instead mount the .ccd file that is next to it. Then the mount programs can recognize the disk.
So for everyone who has an issue with the mounting of CD2 all you have to do is not mount the .img file but instead mount the .ccd file that is next to it.

GAME WORKS FINE. NO VIRUSES, TROJANS...

USED POWER ISO TOOL:

1. MOUNT COH_CD1 TO VIRTUAL DRIVE
2. START INSTALLATION
3. WHEN IT STOPS - MOUNT COH_CD2 TO VIRTUAL DRIVE
4. OPEN COH_CD2 (EXPLORE), FROM DIRECTORY "CRACK" COPY $$$.DLL FILE AND KOH.EXE AND THEN, PASTE IT TO YOUR C:/PROGRAM FILES/BLACK SEA STUDIOS/... OR ANOTHER INSTALLED FOLDER
5. CLICK "REPLACE" FOR COPIED FILES AND START THE GAME
